sn45.57-61:0.3: 57–61. Five Discourses on Accomplishment in Ethics, Etc. (2nd)
sn45.57-61:1.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
sn45.57-61:1.2: In the same way accomplishment in ethics is the forerunner and precursor of the noble eightfold path for a mendicant. …”
